entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being in a situation that he cannot get out of. He is also described as not being ashamed, but his behavior suggests otherwise.

entities.name: mrs longbottom
entities.description: Mrs. Longbottom is Neville's mother and is defending her son's honor. She mentions that she and her husband were tortured into insanity by You-Know-Who's followers.

relationships.description: Mrs. Longbottom is Neville's mother, defending her son's honor and mentioning their shared experience of being tortured into insanity by You-Know-Who's followers.
